script.name: Sync_MOD_EAPSProtected_VLAN
script.comments: This script synchronizes EAPS Protected VLANs
script.content:
# @METADATASTART #@DetailDescriptionStart ############################################################################# # Extreme Networks(R) CLI Scripting Library # scripting.Script : Synchronization of EAPS protected VLANs ############################################################################# # Revision : 1.0 # Last Updated : 10-JAN-2010 ############################################################################# # Author Name : NMS Team ############################################################################# # Purpose: ############################################################################# # 1. Save EAPS Protected VLAN Configuration ############################################################################# #@DetailDescriptionEnd
# @ScriptDescription "Synchronizes EAPS protected VLAN Config"
# @VariableFieldLabel (description = "Comma separated VLAN Names, INS,REM,DEL-only", # type = String, # scope = global, # required = no) set var eapsProtVLanNameSeq ""
# @VariableFieldLabel (description = "Comma separated EAPS Domain Names" # type = String, # scope = global, # required = yes) set var eapsProtDomainNameSeq ""
# @VariableFieldLabel (description = "Choose Modification Action-Type", # type = String, # scope = global, # required = yes, # validValues = [Modify_Create,Modify_Delete,Modify_Insert,Modify_Remove,Modify_InsRem]) set var eapsProtModifyActionType Modify_Create
# @VariableFieldLabel (description = "Comma separated EAPS Domain Names, this is set when EAPS is inserted and removed on same device" # type = String, # scope = global, # required = yes) set var eapsProtIRDomainNameSeq ""
# @MetaDataEnd
PerformSync -device $deviceIP -scope VLAN -vlan $eapsProtVLanNameSeq PerformSync -device $deviceIP -scope EapsDomain -type protected -name $eapsProtDomainNameSeq if {[string equal $eapsProtModifyActionType "Modify_InsRem"]} { PerformSync -device $deviceIP -scope EapsDomain -type protected -name $eapsProtIRDomainNameSeq }
script.creator: system
